de.teklic.mario.handler.protocols

Interface Communicable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcknowledgeHandler, ErrorHandler, Handler, MessageHandler, ReplyHandler, RequestHandler

    public interface Communicable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forMe(RouteX message)
      Handles the specific RouteX object, when it is for the own node.
      void forward(RouteX message)
      The Handler just forwards the incoming message to the next node or broadcasts the message if no suitable route was found.

    • Method Detail
